summary.span: 表示網域物件的欄位或屬性與資料庫資料表的資料行之間的對應。

span.span: Represents the mapping between a field or a property of a domain object into a column of a database table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DbType As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DbType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得對應資料庫資料行的型別。

span.span: Gets the type of the corresponding database column.

value.span: 做為字串的資料庫資料行型別。

span.span: The type of the database column as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是用來定義 T-SQL 資料表宣告命令中的資料行的確切文字。This will be the exact text used to define the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration command. 如果不這樣定義，資料庫資料行類型是從成員型別推斷而來。If not so defined, the database column type is inferred from the member type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDbGenerated As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDbGenerated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個成員是否會由資料庫自動產生。

span.span: Gets whether this member is automatically generated by the database.

value.span: 如果這個成員會由資料庫自動產生，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this member is automatically generated by the database; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在對應的資料列會插入之後，立即同步處理自動產生的成員。Automatically generated members are synchronized immediately after the corresponding data row is inserted. 插入觸發程序產生的金鑰，不支援值。Insert trigger-generated key values are not supported.

span.span: Gets whether the default behavior is to load this member on a deferred basis.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDiscriminator As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDiscriminator { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個成員是否表示繼承鑑別子。

span.span: Gets whether this member represents the inheritance discriminator.

value.span: 如果這個成員表示繼承鑑別子，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this member represents the inheritance discriminator; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以是`true`最多一個成員的最上層對應階層中的類別。This property can be `true` for at most one member of the topmost mapped class in a hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsPersistent As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個成員是否會對應至資料行 (或條件約束)。

span.span: Gets whether this member is mapped to a column (or constraint).

value.span: 如果這個成員對應至資料行 (或條件約束)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this member is mapped to a column (or constraint); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可能具有持續性和非持續性成員的組合。A class may have a combination of persistent and non-persistent members. 持續性的成員進行對應，而非持續性的成員未對應。Persistent members are mapped while non-persistent members are not mapped. 對應的類別必須至少一個持續性的成員。A mapped class must have at least one persistent member.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsPrimaryKey As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsPrimaryKey { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個成員是否為型別之識別的一部分。

span.span: Gets whether this member is part of the type's identity.

value.span: 如果這個成員是型別之識別的一部分，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this member is part of the type's identity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此屬性為`true`，該類別的成員代表屬於資料表的唯一索引鍵的資料行。If this property is `true`, the class member represents a column that is part of the table's unique key. 類別的多個成員可以將此屬性設定為`true`相關聯的資料行的複合索引鍵。More than one member of the class can have this property set to `true` for a key that is a composite of the associated columns. 將實體類別中，至少一個成員必須要有此屬性，並應該對應至主索引鍵或唯一索引鍵對應的資料表或檢視表中。For an entity class, at least one member must have this attribute and should be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view. 否則，LINQ to SQL 會考慮為唯讀，以將變更提交至資料庫類別的執行個體。Otherwise, LINQ to SQL considers instances of the class as read-only for the purpose of submitting changes to the database. 用來識別資料行集中不需要主索引鍵。The set of columns identified with are not required to be the primary key. 它們只代表一組可唯一識別實體。They simply denote a set that uniquely identifies the entity. 常見的替代項目包含叢集索引資料行或其他唯一的索引鍵資料行。Common alternatives include clustering index columns or other unique key columns.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsVersion As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsVersion { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個成員是否表示資料列版本或時間戳記。

span.span: Gets whether this member represents the row version or timestamp.

value.span: 如果這個成員表示資料列版本或時間戳記，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this member represents the row version or timestamp; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本號碼遞增，每當更新相關聯的資料列時，會更新時間戳記資料行。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated whenever the associated row is updated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UpdateCheck As UpdateCheck
public: abstract property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck UpdateCheck { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個成員的開放式並行存取 (Optimistic Concurrency) 檢查原則。

span.span: Gets the optimistic concurrency check policy for this member.

value.span: 列舉。

span.span: An enum.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果類別沒有版本成員 (設定為`true`)，偵測是藉由比較原始成員值與目前的資料庫狀態。If the class does not have a version member ( set to `true`), detection is done by comparing original member values with the current database state. 屬性會決定 LINQ to SQL 會在開放式並行存取衝突偵測的實作。The property determines how LINQ to SQL implements conflict detection under optimistic concurrency. 這些成員具有此屬性設定為或衝突偵測期間都會列入考慮。Only those members with this property set to or are considered during conflict detection.
